EmailTemplate.name: MIPIM 2014 – Dinner (non-registered)
EmailTemplate.subject: INVITATION: MIPIM 2014 - Dinner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’d love to catch up with you whilst we are at MIPIM this year and hope you can join us for dinner
Tuesday 11 March 2014
8.30pm – 10.30pm
Bistro les Canailles 12 Rue Jean Daumas 06400 Cannes ______
RSVP by Monday 3 March Sharon.Madden@aecom.com +44 (0)7747 118766
